subject: Refund request - order #A123
summary: Jane has reported being charged twice for order A123 and is requesting a refund for the duplicate charge. She has attached her receipt for reference.
action_items: Verify the duplicate charge on order A123 | Process the refund for the duplicate charge | Respond to Jane with the outcome

subject: Billing question
summary: The customer has a billing inquiry regarding an unrecognized subscription charge and is seeking to cancel it.
action_items: Review the customer's account for subscription details. | Provide information on how to cancel the subscription.

subject: App crashes on save
summary: The app crashes on save after creating a note on Windows 11. This issue has been experienced twice.
action_items: Investigate the app's saving functionality on Windows 11 | Collect additional information about the user's environment | Schedule a follow-up to provide updates

subject: Interested in volume pricing
summary: Mike is inquiring about enterprise pricing and SLA details for a team of 50. This suggests a potential sales opportunity.
action_items: Gather enterprise pricing details | Prepare SLA information | Respond to Mike with the requested information

subject: Can't access my account
summary: The customer cannot access their account due to an invalid token error after attempting to reset their password.
action_items: Investigate the invalid token issue | Provide further assistance to the customer

subject: Feature request: CSV export
summary: Frank has requested a CSV export feature for reports, including date and user columns. He is inquiring about plans to implement this feature.

subject: You won a prize!
summary: The email appears to be a spam message claiming a prize that was not won. It is likely a phishing attempt.
action_items: Mark the email as spam | Do not click any links in the email

subject: Very unhappy with support
summary: The client is frustrated due to a delay in support resolution. They are requesting to speak with a manager.
action_items: Escalate the issue to a manager | Issue an apology for the delay | Provide an update on the ongoing support request

subject: Refund follow-up - order #B456
summary: Emma is following up on a promised refund for order B456 that has not yet been received. She requires an update on the status of the refund.
action_items: Check the refund status for order B456 | Update Emma with the refund information

subject: UI bug: misaligned buttons
summary: There is a UI issue on the settings page where the Save and Cancel buttons overlap on smaller screens, as highlighted in the attached screenshot.
action_items: Review the attached screenshot | Investigate the button alignment issue | Implement a fix for the overlapping buttons
